nodes.text: Star Wars: The Legendary Yoda is a 48-page Level 3 DK Readers book released on March 18, 2013. It is written by Catherine Saunders and features a variety of information about Yoda.

In DK Star Wars readers, stunning photographs combine with engaging age-appropriate stories, creating a multilevel reading program guaranteed to capture children's interest while developing their reading skills!
DK Readers: Level 3: Star Wars: The Legendary Yoda

Yoda, the legendary Jedi Master, is the focus of this exciting Level 3 DK reader. Inside, rich vocabulary and challenging sentence structure, as well as an alphabetical glossary and comprehensive index, will help fans learn more about the most wise and mysterious Jedi Master of them all.
